p.codeblock: public static synchronized RtcEngine create(RtcEngineConfig config) throws Exception

section.p: You can create a instance by calling this method or the method. Compared to the latter, this method supports more configuration options, such as specifying the region and setting the log file.

ul.li: All methods provided by are executed asynchronously. It is recommended to call these methods in the same thread.
The SDK supports creating only one instance per app.

section.note: Each app supports creating only one instance. All methods in the class are executed asynchronously. Agora recommends calling these methods in the same thread.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Before calling other APIs, you must call and to create and initialize the object.
You must call this method to create the object before calling any other APIs.

plentry.pd: The configuration parameters for the instance. See .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-1: General error (no specific reason).
-2: Invalid parameter.
-7: SDK not initialized.
-22: Resource request failed. The SDK cannot allocate resources due to excessive system resource usage by your app or insufficient system resources.
-101: Invalid App ID.

section.p: If the method call succeeds, returns the initialized object. If the method call fails, the SDK throws an exception and returns the corresponding error message. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
